meanings.definition: The first decade of a century, especially the years 2000-2009.
meanings.sent1: During the noughties, technology advanced rapidly.
meanings.sent2: Many people remember the noughties for the rise of social media.
meanings.sent3: In the noughties, flip phones were all the rage!
meanings.sent4: The noughties marked a shift towards digital entertainment.
meanings.sent5: Fashion trends in the noughties included low-rise jeans and trucker hats.

meanings.definition: A person or thing of no importance or worth.
meanings.sent1: He was just a noughties in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent2: The broken toy was considered a noughties by the children.
meanings.sent3: The old pen that didn't work became the noughties of the office.
meanings.sent4: To the collector, the counterfeit coin was nothing but a noughties.
meanings.sent5: The scratched DVD was now a noughties in the collection of movies.
